long_description: For those who want minimal fabric between their feet and shoes, the Wigwam Merino Airlite Pro socks are ultralight, non-cushioned socks that wick moisture and add a little protection. Merino wool wicks naturally away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. dri-release(R) is a blend of natural and man-made fibers that work together to absorb and move moisture away from the skin; it dries more rapidly than other fibers. Stretch nylon and polyester add durability and a fit that conforms to your feet. FreshGuard elements are permanently embedded in dri-release fabric; together they absorb moisture and quickly push it through the fabric into the air to minimize odor creation. Wigwam Merino Airlite Pro socks feature non-cushioned bottoms; stay-put, crew-height legs pull moisture from skin for stay-dry comfort. Seamless toe closures prevent toe irritation. dri-release content: 85% polyester/15% cotton. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: For those who want minimal fabric between their feet and shoes, the Wigwam Merino Airlite Pro socks are ultralight, non-cushioned socks that wick moisture and add a little protection.
